message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I'm offering it to you for $14500. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive access to features and support that come with this high-quality offering. I understand its worth to you is $15000, so I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
